articles.title: Man admits conspiring to cheat Microsoft of S$192900 worth of laptops in FBI-flagged case - CNA
articles.description:
SINGAPORE: A Singaporean teenager conspired with an American man to commit fraud against Microsoft by making false warranty claims in order to obtain 56 laptops worth US$143,144 (S$192,900).

articles.description: The netizen, Xie Minghao, accused JJ Lin and Taiwanese-American singer Wilber Pan of rape, taking drugs and evading taxes back in Aug 2021.
articles.content:

articles.title: Colombia's highest court legalizes abortion up to 24 weeks - World News - Castanet.net
articles.description: Colombia became the latest country in Latin America to expand access to abortion Monday as the nation’s Constitutional Court voted to legalize the procedure until the 24th week of pregnancy.
articles.content:

articles.title: Viewers praise RTE Vincent Hanley documentary as ‘raw, honest, difficult and riddled with trauma’ - Irish Mirror
articles.description: The programme delved into the life of iconic presenter Vincent Hanley and his battle with AIDS after moving to America, where he presented the hit television show Music Television USA
articles.content:
Viewers have praised an RTE documentary Vincent Hanley: Sex, Lies and Videotapes, for its honest and detailed portrayal of life in the 80s for the gay community in Ireland.
